p: The addition of either GP (5 or 10 g/100 g diet DM) or VitE (500 mg/100 g diet DM) in a total mixed ration diet, which had a vitamin premix, did not cause remarkable changes in the milk fatty acids profile of ewes. However, the proportions of SFA increased while those of MUFA decreased significantly in the milk of ewes fed with the extra VitE compared with those consuming the other dietary treatments [ 45].
